name: TVRemote
0:
”Alexa ask TV Remote to turn on the TV”
”Alexa ask TV Remote to turn the TV on”
”Alexa start TV Remote and Set the IP to one dot one dot one dot one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. remote
des: I made this skill so I can turn on my TV with my Echo Dot. I set up a web server on a single board computer and connected it to my TV with an HDMI cord. Once you set the IP Address of the server in this skill, you can tell this skill to turn the TV on, which hits the web server, which runs a script that turns on the TV.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
